description:
Purpose: To provision a Virtual Machine in AWS and Install LAMP Stack in it. Image will be selected based on the region where this template is executed. 

Inputs Required: Keypair Name, Security Group Name and Instance Type. 

Use case(s): Bundled provisioning of a VM with latest LAMP stack in it will help Dev/QA/Ops team to quickly use the resource. Need NOT keep an image having LAMP Stack in AWS which will incur cost.
name: AWS_Provision_VM_Install_LAMPStack
